entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
